subject: The Sexiest Woman Alive...
event: ... is Emilia Clarke, our own Daenerys Targaryen, Mother of Dragons, Breaker of Chains, Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea.        It's official. ESQUIRE magazine has proclaimed it so. Read all about it here: http://www.esquire.com/entertainment/interviews/a38719/emilia-clarke-swa-2015/ Good interview, and lovely (and sexy) art. Having been in Emilia's company at numerous GAME OF THRONES event, I can only applaud ESQUIRE's good taste. She is indeed a beautiful woman, and a terrific actresss. Congratulations, Emilia! And applause to the fine folks at ESQUIRE.

props.taglist: sex, awards, hbo, game of thrones

comments.article: Sexiest women alive in two worlds :)
For now...
Game of thrones has had so many beautiful ladies, it's good to see some recognition!
comments.subject: deserved

comments.article:
And you, George RR Martin, have left the sexiest woman alive stranded in the Great Grass Sea surrounded by a Dothraki Khal with unknown intentions. :)

Congratulations to Emilia, she is very lovely.
comments.subject: tisk tisk

comments.article: I too fear for Daenerys Targaryen, Mother of Dragons, Breaker of Chains, Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea.  What fate will befall her?
comments.subject: Re: tisk tisk

comments.article:
Terrific choice.

Well, let's hope she "lands" another "crown" anytime soon!! :-) wink wink
oh yeah...

I'm embarrassed to admit it, but I had a childhood crush on Virginia Woolf. I read an exert from one of her novels in one of my mom's college textbooks that included a biographical sketch and photograph. Is it crazy that my first celebrity crush was someone who was born a century of so before me?
comments.subject: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder...

comments.article: Mother of John Connor, savior of the world from terminators.
Kind of funny that your post could be either about Dany or about Cersei.
She deserves it! But the fact that she seems to be so nice and kind... that's what makes her even better in my opinion!
Congrats! Is she gonna be alive in the ice and fire world till the end? Let's see.

Hello! Your entry got to top-25 of the most popular entries in LiveJournal!
Learn more about LiveJournal Ratings in FAQ.
But who is the sexiest woman in the books in your mind? Something tells me Val or Arianne.
comments.subject: ASOIAF

comments.article:
Interesting question. Hmmmmm.

Arianne is the most overtly sexual, probably. Val is beautiful, certainly, but we don't know much about her sexuality. Shae was pretty sexy as well, as Tyrion would no doubt confirm.
comments.subject: Re: ASOIAF

comments.article: Class!!
She is indeed very beautiful, but Esquire's attempt to call her "THE SEXIST WOMAN ALIVE" is just dumb. There are way more beautiful women than her.
comments.subject: Not really!

comments.article: She's not just your average ordinary sexy, beautiful lady. She's got that laugh and huge smile that could heal all wounds and cause world peace...and that sense of humor and wit!  Her interviews are just as entertaining as her performance on GoT
comments.subject: Yay Emillia!

comments.article: Good for her, she seems like a really nice person and has a great personality - always enjoy seeing her in interviews. Has a lot of range as an actress as well. Look forward to her post GoT career.

On Set ! !!!! Rosie Mac Official Daenerys Double for #GameOfThrones Season 5 <3 Popcorn Time !! :D #TheWinterIsComing

A photo posted by Rosie Mac (@rosiemacc) on Apr 19, 2015 at 9:07am PDT
comments.subject: So Rosie Mac is the vice sexy queen then

comments.article:
"Emilia had one of the few characters who couldn't be killed."
Oh dear, oh dear, oh dear. The journalist obviously has it in for Daenerys.
It is known.
comments.subject: Sexiest woman alive.

comments.article:
She is the reason I am watching Games of Thrones :)
She is like not a human when she has a white hair :)
Great choice! Great photos too!
She reminds me of Audrey Hepburn. Beautiful face, beautiful body. I think if she wanted to, she could definitely pass for Eliza Doolittle.
comments.subject: Remembrance

comments.article:
I hope this isn't a creepy question, but as it is talking about the sexy muse that Emilia is, I was wondering if her "Game of Thrones" contract changed from the first two seasons-ish to also include that she doesn't do any more nude scenes? Just curious as there is some pretty explicit scenarios with her and Daario in the book, and it being HBO and all I thought we would get some of that in the past season. Not that it's really an issue, but just wondering if it was a contractual change since she basically blew up from this role? Or was it just something that wasn't supposed to be as explicit as in the books?

Also side question; how does an actor/actress go from being ok with nudity in a contract, to not wanting to be nude anymore? Does it require some sort of "fee" since it might be a breach of contract, or was there just never any stipulations to any nudity in the contract, in the first place? Thanks for any questions answered!
comments.subject: No more nudity?

comments.article:
Hmmm... is kind of a creepy question, actually, but...

People change. And so do contracts.

And I have sure we will still have sufficient nudity.
comments.subject: Re: No more nudity?

comments.article: Hello,Mr.Martin,I'm Ruiya Chen,a journalist from Portrait, one of the most influential and authentic news & profile magazines in China. We want to invite you to join the 2015 “Globe 30”. Every year since 2013, we have invited 30 most significant people worldwide. We would like to conduct this interview via email or Skype as you prefer, through a Proust-style questionnaire. Please respond me your email address, I’ll send you the interview invitation.
comments.subject: interview invitation

comments.article:
I'm afraid I will have to pass.

Too much on my plate just now.
comments.subject: Re: interview invitation

comments.article: And congratulations to Jai Courtney, Seth MacFarlane and the other male celebs who know what it's like to date the sexiest woman alive.
